entry.content: Image: The Arcane Library Eat The Reich, a game about vampires hunting Hitler, also takes home gold The Shadowdark tabletop role-playing game won the top prize in this year‚Äôs Ennie Awards. And that‚Äôs not all! A panel of experts gave the old-school-inspired RPG three other gold medals as well, including Best Game, Best Layout and Design, and even Best Rules. That gives creator Kelsey Dionne and her team at The Arcane Library about as clean a sweep you can get in Gen Con‚Äôs biggest awards program...

Publisher Warner Bros. Games will address that exclusion later this year with Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions, a new single-player and online competitive multiplayer game based on the wizarding sport.
